column11:
Select * from rcopia_xref where  rcopia_id= {PATIENTID} and External_ID='{EXTERNALID}' and system_name = '{SYSTEMNAME}' and deleted='n'

column12:
{PATIENTID}=RCExtResponse.Response.PatientList.Patient.RcopiaID
PARAMETERSEP
{EXTERNALID}=RCExtResponse.Response.PatientList.Patient.ExternalIdentifierList.ExternalIdentifier.ExternalID[0]
PARAMETERSEP
{SYSTEMNAME}=RCExtResponse.Response.PatientList.Patient.ExternalIdentifierList.ExternalIdentifier.SystemName[0]
SEPERATOR
{PATIENTID}=RCExtResponse.Response.PatientList.Patient.RcopiaID
PARAMETERSEP
{EXTERNALID}=RCExtResponse.Response.PatientList.Patient.ExternalIdentifierList.ExternalIdentifier.ExternalID[1]
PARAMETERSEP
{SYSTEMNAME}=RCExtResponse.Response.PatientList.Patient.ExternalIdentifierList.ExternalIdentifier.SystemName[1]
SEPERATOR
{PATIENTID}=RCExtResponse.Response.PatientList.Patient.RcopiaID
